conbody.p: A Help me! pop-up message ( ) will appear over a student panel whenever this student presses Call teacher button in the student module. The student's icon will also change to a green phone receiver.
Click on the student panel to dismiss the message and start a conversation (see section ) with the student.
Double click on the student panel to open a messaging window ( ) addressed to the student where you can ask what is the nature of the problem.
